name: Unicratch project
description:
In this project you can find some remixes of some Scratch projects, if you are interested you can click on the name of the project or the creator to see them on the scratch page, the instructions and notes are the same as on the page.

This is a work that is still in development, so I would really appreciate your valuable opinion, and if you are a Scratcher and you want me to remix a project of yours, you just have to tell me here: Unicratch project in Scratch
